public class ThreadDeadLock {    public static void main(String[] args) {        StringBuilder s1 = new StringBuilder();        StringBuilder s2 = new StringBuilder();        new Thread(() -> {            synchronized (s1) {                s1.append("a");                s2.append("1");                try {                    Thread.sleep(100);                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                }                synchronized (s2) {                    s1.append("b");                    s2.append("2");                    System.out.println(s1);                    System.out.println(s2);                }            }        }).start();        new Thread(() -> {            synchronized (s2) {                s1.append("c");                s2.append("3");                try {                    Thread.sleep(100);                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                }                synchronized (s1) {                    s1.append("d");                    s2.append("4");                    System.out.println(s1);                    System.out.println(s2);                }            }        }).start();    }}

public class PhantomReferenceTest {    public static PhantomReferenceTest obj;//å½“å‰ç±»å¯¹è±¡çš„å£°æ˜    static ReferenceQueue<PhantomReferenceTest> phantomQueue = null;//å¼•ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—    public static class CheckRefQueue extends Thread {        @Override        public void run() {            while (true) {                if (phantomQueue != null) {                    PhantomReference<PhantomReferenceTest> objt = null;                    try {                        objt = (PhantomReference<PhantomReferenceTest>) phantomQueue.remove();                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {                        e.printStackTrace();                    }                    if (objt != null) {                        System.out.println("è¿½è¸ªåƒåœ¾å›æ”¶è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼šPhantomReferenceTestå®ä¾‹è¢«GCäº†");                    }                }            }        }    }    @Override    protected void finalize() throws Throwable { //finalize()æ–¹æ³•åªèƒ½è¢«è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼        super.finalize();        System.out.println("è°ƒç”¨å½“å‰ç±»çš„finalize()æ–¹æ³•");        obj = this;    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        Thread t = new CheckRefQueue();        t.setDaemon(true);//è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹ï¼šå½“ç¨‹åºä¸­æ²¡æœ‰éå®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹æ—¶ï¼Œå®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹ä¹Ÿå°±æ‰§è¡Œç»“æŸã€‚        t.start();        phantomQueue = new ReferenceQueue<PhantomReferenceTest>();        obj = new PhantomReferenceTest();        //æ„é€ äº† PhantomReferenceTest å¯¹è±¡çš„è™šå¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‡å®šäº†å¼•ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—        PhantomReference<PhantomReferenceTest> phantomRef = new PhantomReference<>(obj, phantomQueue);        try {            //ä¸å¯è·å–è™šå¼•ç”¨ä¸­çš„å¯¹è±¡            System.out.println(phantomRef.get());System.out.println("ç¬¬ 1 æ¬¡ gc");            //å°†å¼ºå¼•ç”¨å»é™¤            obj = null;            //ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è¿›è¡ŒGC,ç”±äºå¯¹è±¡å¯å¤æ´»ï¼ŒGCæ— æ³•å›æ”¶è¯¥å¯¹è±¡            System.gc();            Thread.sleep(1000);            if (obj == null) {                System.out.println("obj æ˜¯ null");            } else {                System.out.println("obj å¯ç”¨");            }            System.out.println("ç¬¬ 2 æ¬¡ gc");            obj = null;            System.gc(); //ä¸€æ—¦å°†objå¯¹è±¡å›æ”¶ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå°†æ­¤è™šå¼•ç”¨å­˜æ”¾åˆ°å¼•ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ã€‚            Thread.sleep(1000);            if (obj == null) {                System.out.println("obj æ˜¯ null");            } else {                System.out.println("obj å¯ç”¨");            }        } catch (InterruptedException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    }}

public class CanReliveObj {    public static CanReliveObj obj;//ç±»å˜é‡ï¼Œå±äº GC Root    //æ­¤æ–¹æ³•åªèƒ½è¢«è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡    @Override    protected void finalize() throws Throwable {        super.finalize();        System.out.println("è°ƒç”¨å½“å‰ç±»é‡å†™çš„finalize()æ–¹æ³•");        obj = this;//å½“å‰å¾…å›æ”¶çš„å¯¹è±¡åœ¨finalize()æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ä¸å¼•ç”¨é“¾ä¸Šçš„ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡objå»ºç«‹äº†è”ç³»    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        try {            obj = new CanReliveObj();            // å¯¹è±¡ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æˆåŠŸæ‹¯æ•‘è‡ªå·±            obj = null;            System.gc();//è°ƒç”¨åƒåœ¾å›æ”¶å™¨            System.out.println("ç¬¬1æ¬¡ gc");            // å› ä¸ºFinalizerçº¿ç¨‹ä¼˜å…ˆçº§å¾ˆä½ï¼Œæš‚åœ2ç§’ï¼Œä»¥ç­‰å¾…å®ƒ            Thread.sleep(2000);            if (obj == null) {                System.out.println("obj is dead");            } else {                System.out.println("obj is still alive");            }            System.out.println("ç¬¬2æ¬¡ gc");            // ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç ä¸ä¸Šé¢çš„å®Œå…¨ç›¸åŒï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™æ¬¡è‡ªæ•‘å´å¤±è´¥äº†            obj = null;            System.gc();            // å› ä¸ºFinalizerçº¿ç¨‹ä¼˜å…ˆçº§å¾ˆä½ï¼Œæš‚åœ2ç§’ï¼Œä»¥ç­‰å¾…å®ƒ            Thread.sleep(2000);            if (obj == null) {                System.out.println("obj is dead");            } else {                System.out.println("obj is still alive");            }        } catch (InterruptedException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    }}

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;import org.springframework.core.io.FileSystemResource;import org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSenderImpl;import org.springframework.mail.javamail.MimeMessageHelper;import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;import javax.annotation.Resource;import javax.mail.MessagingException;import java.io.File;import java.util.Date;/** * é‚®ä»¶ä¸šåŠ¡ç±» * @author qzz */@Service@Slf4jpublic class MailService {    /**     * æ³¨å…¥é‚®ä»¶å·¥å…·ç±»     */    @Resource    private JavaMailSenderImpl javaMailSender;    @Value("${spring.mail.username}")    private String sendMailer;    /**     * æ£€æµ‹é‚®ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯ç±»     * @param to æ”¶ä»¶äºº     * @param subject ä¸»é¢˜     * @param text æ–‡æœ¬     */    private void checkMail(String to,String subject,String text){        if(StringUtils.isEmpty(to)){            throw new RuntimeException("é‚®ä»¶æ”¶ä¿¡äººä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");        }        if(StringUtils.isEmpty(subject)){            throw new RuntimeException("é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");        }        if(StringUtils.isEmpty(text)){            throw new RuntimeException("é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");        }    }    /**     * å‘é€çº¯æ–‡æœ¬é‚®ä»¶     * @param to æ”¶ä»¶äºº     * @param subject ä¸»é¢˜     * @param text æ–‡æœ¬     */    public void sendTextMailMessage(String to,String subject,String text){        try {            //true ä»£è¡¨æ”¯æŒå¤æ‚çš„ç±»å‹            MimeMessageHelper mimeMessageHelper = new MimeMessageHelper(javaMailSender.createMimeMessage(),true);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘ä¿¡äºº            mimeMessageHelper.setFrom(sendMailer);            //é‚®ä»¶æ”¶ä¿¡äºº  1æˆ–å¤šä¸ª            mimeMessageHelper.setTo(to.split(","));            //é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜            mimeMessageHelper.setSubject(subject);            //é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹            mimeMessageHelper.setText(text);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘é€æ—¶é—´            mimeMessageHelper.setSentDate(new Date());            //å‘é€é‚®ä»¶            javaMailSender.send(mimeMessageHelper.getMimeMessage());            log.info("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶æˆåŠŸ: {} -> {}", sendMailer, to);        } catch (MessagingException e) {            log.warn("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {}", e.getMessage());        }    }    /**     * å‘é€htmlé‚®ä»¶     * @param to æ”¶ä»¶äºº     * @param subject ä¸»é¢˜     * @param content é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹     */    public void sendHtmlMailMessage(String to,String subject,String content){        content="<!DOCTYPE html>
" +                "<html>
" +                "<head>
" +                "<meta charset="utf-8">
" +                "<title>é‚®ä»¶</title>
" +                "</head>
" +                "<body>
" +                "	<h3>è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€å°HTMLé‚®ä»¶ï¼</h3>
" +                "</body>
" +                "</html>";        try {            //true ä»£è¡¨æ”¯æŒå¤æ‚çš„ç±»å‹            MimeMessageHelper mimeMessageHelper = new MimeMessageHelper(javaMailSender.createMimeMessage(),true);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘ä¿¡äºº            mimeMessageHelper.setFrom(sendMailer);            //é‚®ä»¶æ”¶ä¿¡äºº  1æˆ–å¤šä¸ª            mimeMessageHelper.setTo(to.split(","));            //é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜            mimeMessageHelper.setSubject(subject);            //é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹   true ä»£è¡¨æ”¯æŒhtml            mimeMessageHelper.setText(content,true);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘é€æ—¶é—´            mimeMessageHelper.setSentDate(new Date());            //å‘é€é‚®ä»¶            javaMailSender.send(mimeMessageHelper.getMimeMessage());            log.info("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶æˆåŠŸ: {} -> {}", sendMailer, to);        } catch (MessagingException e) {            log.warn("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {}", e.getMessage());        }    }    /**     * å‘é€å¸¦é™„ä»¶çš„é‚®ä»¶     * @param to      é‚®ä»¶æ”¶ä¿¡äºº     * @param subject é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜     * @param content é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹     * @param filePath é™„ä»¶è·¯å¾„     */    public void sendAttachmentMailMessage(String to,String subject,String content,String filePath){        try {            //true ä»£è¡¨æ”¯æŒå¤æ‚çš„ç±»å‹            MimeMessageHelper mimeMessageHelper = new MimeMessageHelper(javaMailSender.createMimeMessage(),true);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘ä¿¡äºº            mimeMessageHelper.setFrom(sendMailer);            //é‚®ä»¶æ”¶ä¿¡äºº  1æˆ–å¤šä¸ª            mimeMessageHelper.setTo(to.split(","));            //é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜            mimeMessageHelper.setSubject(subject);            //é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹   true ä»£è¡¨æ”¯æŒhtml            mimeMessageHelper.setText(content,true);            //é‚®ä»¶å‘é€æ—¶é—´            mimeMessageHelper.setSentDate(new Date());            //æ·»åŠ é‚®ä»¶é™„ä»¶            FileSystemResource file = new FileSystemResource(new File(filePath));            String fileName = file.getFilename();            mimeMessageHelper.addAttachment(fileName, file);            //å‘é€é‚®ä»¶            javaMailSender.send(mimeMessageHelper.getMimeMessage());            log.info("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶æˆåŠŸ: {} -> {}", sendMailer, to);        } catch (MessagingException e) {            log.warn("å‘é€é‚®ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {}", e.getMessage());        }    }}

import java.nio.ByteBuffer;import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;public class TestByteBufferExamDee {    public static void main(String[] args) {        ByteBuffer source = ByteBuffer.allocate(32);        source.put("Hello,world
I'm zhangsan
Ho".getBytes());        split(source);        source.put("w are you?
".getBytes());        split(source);    }    private static void split(ByteBuffer source) {        // åˆ‡æ¢è¯»æ¨¡å¼        source.flip();        // éå†buffer        for (int i = 0; i < source.limit(); i++) {            if (source.get(i) == '
') {                // æ¥æ”¶è€…çš„é•¿åº¦ = 
 çš„ä½ç½® - å½“å‰è¯»æŒ‡é’ˆä½ç½® + 1                int l = i - source.position();                ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(l);                for (int j = 0; j < l; j++) {                    buffer.put(source.get());                }                source.get(); // æ­¤å¤„è¦è®©positionå†æ¥ç€èµ°ä¸€æ­¥, è·³è¿‡
                buffer.flip();                System.out.println(StandardCharsets.UTF_8.decode(buffer));            }        }        // è¯»å–å®Œé‡æ–°å‹ç¼© buffer(æ­¤å¤„ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨clear)        source.compact();    }}

å•çº¿ç¨‹å¯ä»¥é…åˆ Selector å®Œæˆå¯¹å¤šä¸ª Channel å¯è¯»å†™äº‹ä»¶çš„ç›‘æ§ï¼Œè¿™ç§°ä¹‹ä¸ºå¤šè·¯å¤ç”¨

  • å¦‚æœä¸ç”¨ Selector çš„éé˜»å¡æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æ—¶é—´éƒ½åœ¨åšæ— ç”¨åŠŸï¼Œè€Œ Selector èƒ½å¤Ÿä¿è¯
    • æœ‰å¯è¿æ¥äº‹ä»¶æ—¶æ‰å»è¿æ¥

    • æœ‰å¯å†™äº‹ä»¶æ‰å»å†™å…¥
      • é™äºç½‘ç»œä¼ è¾“èƒ½åŠ›ï¼ŒChannel æœªå¿…æ—¶æ—¶å¯å†™ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦ Channel å¯å†™ï¼Œä¼šè§¦å‘ Selector çš„å¯å†™äº‹ä»¶

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import java.io.IOException;import java.net.InetSocketAddress;import java.nio.ByteBuffer;import java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel;import java.nio.channels.SelectionKey;import java.nio.channels.Selector;import java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel;import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;import java.util.Iterator;/** * @author Dee * @date 2023/10/19 * <p>Description: NIO demo, ä½¿ç”¨Selectorç®¡ç† */@Slf4jpublic class DeeServer {    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {        // å¼€å¯æœåŠ¡å™¨        ServerSocketChannel ssc = ServerSocketChannel.open();        // è®¾ç½®ä¸ºéé˜»å¡        ssc.configureBlocking(false);        // ç»‘å®šç«¯å£        ssc.bind(new InetSocketAddress(8080));        // åˆ›å»ºselectç®¡ç†å¤šä¸ªchannel        Selector sel = Selector.open();        // æ³¨å†Œssc        SelectionKey sscKey = ssc.register(sel, 0, null);        log.info("æ³¨å†Œssc, {}", sscKey);        // å…³æ³¨æ¥æ”¶äº‹ä»¶        sscKey.interestOps(SelectionKey.OP_ACCEPT);        while (true) {            sel.select(); // æ— äº‹ä»¶é˜»å¡, æœ‰äº‹ä»¶ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ            log.info("æœ‰äº‹ä»¶æ¥å…¥");            // éå†selKeys            Iterator<SelectionKey> ite = sel.selectedKeys().iterator();            while (ite.hasNext()) {                SelectionKey sk = ite.next();                log.info("è¿­ä»£sk, {}", sk);                ite.remove(); // å¤„ç†keyçš„æ—¶å€™ä¸€å®šç”¨åˆ é™¤, å¦åˆ™æ¯æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å¤„ç†ç›¸åŒkeyä¼šnpe                if (sk.isAcceptable()) { // å¦‚æœæ˜¯è®¿é—®äº‹ä»¶                    // è·å–é€šé“                    SelectableChannel channel = sk.channel();                    // å¼ºè½¬ä¸º ssc                    ServerSocketChannel ssch = (ServerSocketChannel) channel;                    // å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥                    SocketChannel sc = ssch.accept();                    sc.configureBlocking(false); // è®¾ç½®ä¸ºéé˜»å¡                    // åˆ†é…ç©ºé—´                    ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(16); // attachment                    // æ³¨å†Œsc, å°†bufferä½œä¸ºé™„ä»¶å…³è”                    SelectionKey scKey = sc.register(sel, 0, buffer);                    // å…³æ³¨è¯»äº‹ä»¶                    scKey.interestOps(SelectionKey.OP_READ);                    log.info("è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ, {}", sc);                } else if (sk.isReadable()) { // å¦‚æœæ˜¯è¯»å–äº‹ä»¶                    try {                        // è·å–é€šé“å¹¶å¼ºè½¬                        SocketChannel channel = (SocketChannel) sk.channel();                        // è·å–é™„ä»¶(buffer)                        ByteBuffer buffer = (ByteBuffer) sk.attachment();                        int read = channel.read(buffer); // å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ­£å¸¸æ–­å¼€, readæ˜¯-1                        if (read == -1) {                            sk.cancel();                        } else {                            // æˆªå–
                            split(buffer);                            // å¦‚æœæˆªå–åå‘ç°æŒ‡é’ˆæ²¡å˜, è¯´æ˜æ²¡æ¥åˆ°
, éœ€è¦æ‰©å®¹                            if (buffer.position() == buffer.limit()) {                                // åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„bfå¹¶æ›¿æ¢attachment                                ByteBuffer newBuffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(buffer.capacity() << 1);                                buffer.flip();                                newBuffer.put(buffer);                                sk.attach(newBuffer);                            }                        }                    } catch (IOException e) {                        e.printStackTrace();                        sk.cancel(); // äº‹ä»¶å–æ¶ˆæ³¨å†Œ, å› ä¸ºå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å·²ç»æ–­å¼€, ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ªè¯»äº‹ä»¶, å› æ­¤ä¸å¤„ç†ä¼šæ­»å¾ªç¯                    }                }            }        }    }    /**     *     * @param source     */    private static void split(ByteBuffer source) {        source.flip();        // å¾ªç¯éå†        for (int i = 0; i < source.limit(); i++) {            if (source.get(i) == '
') {                int l = i - source.position();                ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(l);                for (int j = 0; j < l; j++) {                    buffer.put(source.get());                }                source.get();                buffer.flip(); // æ­¤å¤„åˆ«å¿˜äº†, è½¬æ¢ä¸ºè¯»æ¨¡å¼                System.out.println(StandardCharsets.UTF_8.decode(buffer));            }        }        source.compact();    }}

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import java.io.IOException;import java.net.InetSocketAddress;import java.nio.ByteBuffer;import java.nio.channels.SelectionKey;import java.nio.channels.Selector;import java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel;import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;import java.nio.charset.Charset;import java.util.Iterator;/** * @author Dee * @date 2023/10/23 * <p>Description: å¤„ç†writeå†™äº‹ä»¶ */@Slf4jpublic class DeeWriteServer {    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {        ServerSocketChannel ssc = ServerSocketChannel.open();        ssc.configureBlocking(false);        Selector selector = Selector.open();        ssc.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_ACCEPT);        ssc.bind(new InetSocketAddress(8080));        while (true) {            selector.select();            Iterator<SelectionKey> iter = selector.selectedKeys().iterator();            while (iter.hasNext()) {                SelectionKey sk = iter.next();                iter.remove();                if (sk.isAcceptable()) {                    // æ­¤å¤„å› ä¸ºçŸ¥é“ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ sscçš„è¿æ¥, å› æ­¤å°±ä¸å†ä»skä¸­å–é€šé“                    SocketChannel sc = ssc.accept();                    log.info("å·²è¿æ¥");                    sc.configureBlocking(false);                    SelectionKey sck = sc.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_READ);                    // æµ‹è¯•å†™ ä¸‰ç™¾ä¸‡ä¸ªé•¿åº¦çš„ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²                    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();                    for (int i = 0; i < 10000000; i++) {                        sb.append("a");                    }                    ByteBuffer bf = Charset.defaultCharset().encode(sb.toString());                    // å…ˆå†™ä¸€æ¬¡                    int write = sc.write(bf);                    System.out.println(write); // æ‰“å°å†™äº†å¤šå°‘çš„é•¿åº¦                    // é˜²æ­¢å†™ä¸å®Œ, å¦‚æœè¿˜æœ‰å‰©ä½™çš„ç»§ç»­å†™                    if (bf.hasRemaining()) {                        // æœªå†™å®Œçš„ä¼šè§¦å‘æ–°çš„äº‹ä»¶, å› æ­¤éœ€è¦å…³æ³¨å†™äº‹ä»¶, åŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿè¦æ‹¿åˆ°ä¹‹å‰çš„äº‹ä»¶                        sck.interestOps(sck.interestOps() | SelectionKey.OP_WRITE);//                        sk.interestOps(sk.interestOps() + SelectionKey.OP_WRITE); // ä¸¤ç§å†™æ³•                        // æŠŠbufferå­˜èµ·æ¥                        sck.attach(bf);                    }                } else if (sk.isWritable()) {                    // æŠŠä¸Šæ¬¡æœªå†™å®Œçš„bufferæ‹¿å‡ºæ¥                    ByteBuffer bf = (ByteBuffer) sk.attachment();                    SocketChannel sc = (SocketChannel) sk.channel();                    int write = sc.write(bf);                    System.out.println(write);                    // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®å¯å†™äº†, åˆ™åˆ é™¤é™„ä»¶, å¹¶ä¸”å»é™¤å…³æ³¨çš„è¯»äº‹ä»¶                    if (!bf.hasRemaining()) {                        sk.attach(null);                        sk.interestOps(sk.interestOps() & ~SelectionKey.OP_WRITE);                    }                }            }        }    }}
  • å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
import java.io.IOException;import java.net.InetSocketAddress;import java.nio.ByteBuffer;import java.nio.channels.SocketChannel;/** * @author Dee * @date 2023/10/24 * <p>Description: */public class DeeWriteClient {    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {        SocketChannel sc = SocketChannel.open();        sc.connect(new InetSocketAddress(8080));        int count = 0; // å®šä¹‰æ€»å…±è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦        while (true) {            ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(1024 * 1024);            count += sc.read(buffer);            System.out.println("è¯»å–çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼š" + count);        }    }}

selectorä¸é˜»å¡æƒ…å†µ

  • äº‹ä»¶å‘ç”Ÿæ—¶
    • å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘èµ·è¿æ¥è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œä¼šè§¦å‘ accept äº‹ä»¶
    • å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ•°æ®è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ­£å¸¸ã€å¼‚å¸¸å…³é—­æ—¶ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šè§¦å‘ read äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå¦å¤–å¦‚æœå‘é€çš„æ•°æ®å¤§äº buffer ç¼“å†²åŒºï¼Œä¼šè§¦å‘å¤šæ¬¡è¯»å–äº‹ä»¶

import ch.qos.logback.classic.LoggerContext;import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;import javax.websocket.*;import javax.websocket.server.ServerEndpoint;import java.io.IOException;import java.util.Random;/** * WebSocketè·å–å®æ—¶æ—¥å¿—å¹¶è¾“å‡ºåˆ°Webé¡µé¢ */@Slf4j@Component@ServerEndpoint(value = "/websocket/logging")public class LoggingWSServer {    //ä¸æŸä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„è¿æ¥ä¼šè¯ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å®ƒæ¥ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ•°æ®    private Session session;    private Integer sessionId;    /**     * è¿æ¥å»ºç«‹æˆåŠŸè°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•     */    @OnOpen    public void onOpen(Session session) {        this.session = session;        this.sessionId = (new Random()).nextInt(100000);        LoggerContext lc = (LoggerContext)LoggerFactory.getILoggerFactory();        // ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šè·å–æ—¥å¿—å¯¹è±¡ ï¼ˆæ—¥å¿—æ˜¯æœ‰ç»§æ‰¿å…³ç³»çš„ï¼Œå…³é—­ä¸Šå±‚ï¼Œä¸‹å±‚å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ç‰¹æ®Šè¯´æ˜ä¹Ÿä¼šå…³é—­ï¼‰        ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger rootLogger = lc.getLogger("root");        MyAppender myAppender = new MyAppender(this);        myAppender.setContext(lc);        // è‡ªå®šä¹‰Appenderè®¾ç½®name        myAppender.setName("myAppender" + sessionId);        myAppender.start();        rootLogger.addAppender(myAppender);        System.out.println("====æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸ====");    }    /**     * è¿æ¥å…³é—­è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•     */    @OnClose    public void onClose() {        LoggerContext lc = (LoggerContext)LoggerFactory.getILoggerFactory();        ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger rootLogger = lc.getLogger("root");        // é€šè¿‡nameç§»é™¤Appender        rootLogger.detachAppender("myAppender" + sessionId);        System.out.println("====ç§»é™¤æˆåŠŸ====");    }    /**     * æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸»åŠ¨å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯     */    public void sendMessage(String message) throws IOException {        this.session.getBasicRemote().sendText(message);    }}

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;import org.springframework.boot.ApplicationRunner;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;import org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard.ServerEndpointExporter;import java.net.InetAddress;import java.net.UnknownHostException;/** * WebSocketé…ç½® */@Slf4j@RestController@Configurationpublic class WebSocketConfig {    /**     * ç”¨é€”ï¼šæ‰«æå¹¶æ³¨å†Œæ‰€æœ‰æºå¸¦@ServerEndpointæ³¨è§£çš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚ @ServerEndpoint("/websocket")     * PSï¼šå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨å¤–éƒ¨å®¹å™¨ åˆ™æ— éœ€æä¾›ServerEndpointExporterã€‚     */    @Bean    public ServerEndpointExporter serverEndpointExporter() {        return new ServerEndpointExporter();    }    /**     * ç«¯å£     */    @Value("${server.port}")    private String port;    @Bean    public ApplicationRunner applicationRunner() {        return applicationArguments -> {            try {                InetAddress ia = InetAddress.getLocalHost();                //è·å–æœ¬æœºå†…ç½‘IP                log.info("å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸï¼š" + "http://" + ia.getHostAddress() + ":" + port + "/");            } catch (UnknownHostException ex) {                ex.printStackTrace();            }        };    }    /**     * è·³è½¬å®æ—¶æ—¥å¿—     */    @GetMapping("/logging")    public ModelAndView logging() {        return new ModelAndView("logging.html");    }    /**     * æµ‹è¯•æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡º     */    @GetMapping("/testLog")    public String testLog() throws Exception {        log.info("æµ‹è¯•æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡º");        if (true) {            throw new Exception("å¼‚å¸¸æµ‹è¯•");        }        return "testLog";    }}

import ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent;import ch.qos.logback.core.AppenderBase;import java.io.IOException;import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;import java.util.Date;public class MyAppender extends AppenderBase<ILoggingEvent> {private final LoggingWSServer webSocketServer;public MyAppender(LoggingWSServer webSocketServer) {this.webSocketServer = webSocketServer;}/** * æ·»åŠ æ—¥å¿— * @param iLoggingEvent */@Overrideprotected void append(ILoggingEvent iLoggingEvent) {try {webSocketServer.sendMessage(doLayout(iLoggingEvent));} catch (IOException e) {e.printStackTrace();}}/** * æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¥å¿— * @param event */public String doLayout(ILoggingEvent event) {StringBuilder sbuf = new StringBuilder();if (null != event && null != event.getMDCPropertyMap()) {SimpleDateFormat simpleDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss:SSS");sbuf.append(simpleDateFormat.format(new Date(event.getTimeStamp())));sbuf.append("\t");sbuf.append(event.getLevel());sbuf.append("\t");sbuf.append(event.getThreadName());sbuf.append("\t");sbuf.append(event.getLoggerName());sbuf.append("\t");sbuf.append(event.getFormattedMessage().replace("\"", "\\\""));sbuf.append("\t");}return sbuf.toString();}}

import java.util.ArrayDeque;import java.util.Deque;import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;import java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition;import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;/** * <p>Description: * é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—, é‡‡ç”¨ç”Ÿäº§è€…æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¨¡å¼ */public class BlockingQueue<T> {    // 1. ä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—    private Deque<T> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();    // 2. é”    private ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();    // 3. ç”Ÿäº§è€…æ¡ä»¶    private Condition fullWaitCond = lock.newCondition();    // 4. æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¡ä»¶    private Condition emptyWaitCond = lock.newCondition();    // 5. å®¹é‡    private int capcity;    public BlockingQueue(int capcity) {        this.capcity = capcity;    }    // é˜»å¡è·å–    public T poll(long timeout, TimeUnit unit) {        // å°è¯•è·å–é”        lock.lock();        try {            // å°†æ—¶é—´è½¬ä¸ºçº³ç§’            long nanos = unit.toNanos(timeout);            // å¦‚æœä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©º, åˆ™è¿›å¾ªç¯å°è¯•            while (queue.isEmpty()) {                // å¦‚æœç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´ä¸º0, åˆ™è¿”å›ç©º                if (nanos <= 0) {                    return null;                }                // è¿›å…¥ç©ºé—²ç­‰å¾…, å¦‚æœåœ¨æ­¤æœŸé—´è¢«å”¤é†’, åˆ™é‡ç½®ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´(ç”¨äºé˜²æ­¢è™šå‡å”¤é†’)                try {                    nanos = emptyWaitCond.awaitNanos(nanos);                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    throw new RuntimeException(e);                }            }            // æå–é˜Ÿåˆ—é¦–ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡            T t = queue.removeFirst();            // å”¤é†’æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹            fullWaitCond.signal();            return t;        } finally {            lock.unlock();        }    }    public void put(T t) {        // å°è¯•è·å–é”        lock.lock();        try {            while (queue.size() == capcity) {                // å¦‚æœå®¹é‡æ»¡, åˆ™å¾ªç¯ç­‰å¾…                try {                    // è¿›å…¥é¥±å’Œç­‰å¾…                    fullWaitCond.await();                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    throw new RuntimeException(e);                }            }            // æ·»åŠ è‡³é˜Ÿåˆ—            queue.addLast(t);            // åŠ å®Œé˜Ÿåˆ—å, é€šçŸ¥æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹            emptyWaitCond.signal();        } finally {            lock.unlock();        }    }}

çº¿ç¨‹æ± 

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import java.util.HashSet;import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;@Slf4j(topic = "ThreadPool")public class ThreadPool {    /**     * ä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—     */    private BlockingQueue<Runnable> taskQueue;    // çº¿ç¨‹é›†åˆ: æ­¤å¤„å°†çº¿ç¨‹åšä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…è£…    private HashSet<Worker> works = new HashSet<>();    // æ ¸å¿ƒçº¿ç¨‹æ•°    private int coreSize;    // è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´, ä¸€æ—¦è¶…è¿‡è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´, åˆ™å…³é—­çº¿ç¨‹    private long timeout;    private TimeUnit timeUnit;    public ThreadPool(int coreSize, long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit, int queueCapcity) {        this.coreSize = coreSize;        this.timeout = timeout;        this.timeUnit = timeUnit;        this.taskQueue = new BlockingQueue<>(queueCapcity);    }    /**     * æ‰§è¡Œ     *     * @param task     */    public void execute(Runnable task) {        try {            // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ < æ ¸å¿ƒçº¿ç¨‹æ•°æ—¶            if (works.size() < coreSize) {                Worker worker = new Worker(task);                log.debug("æ–°å¢ worker {} task={}", worker, task);                works.add(worker);                worker.start();            } else {                log.debug("åŠ å…¥ä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ— {}", task);                taskQueue.put(task);            }        } catch (Exception e) {        } finally {        }    }    /**     * çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡     */    public class Worker extends Thread{        private Runnable task;        public Worker(Runnable task) {            this.task = task;        }        @Override        public void run() {            // æ‰§è¡Œä»»åŠ¡            // 1) å½“æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡æ—¶            // 2) å½“ä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ä¸ºç©ºæ—¶            while (task != null || (task = taskQueue.poll(timeout, timeUnit)) != null) {                try {                    log.debug("æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œ...{} ", task);                    task.run();                } catch (Exception e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                } finally {                    task = null;                }            }            synchronized (works) {                log.debug("worker è¢«ç§»é™¤ {}", this);                works.remove(this);            }        }    }}

@Slf4jclass TestPool{    public static void main(String[] args) {        ThreadPool threadPool = new ThreadPool(2, 1000, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, 10);        // ç”±ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹ç»™çº¿ç¨‹æ± æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {            int j = i;            threadPool.execute(() ->                log.debug("{}", j)            );        }    }}

public static void main(String[] args) {List<String> list = Arrays.asList("tom", "jack", "ben");    // æ‰“å°åˆ—è¡¨    demo3(list, System.out::println);    // è½¬ä¸ºå¤§å†™åæ‰“å°    demo3(list, item -> System.out.println(item.toUpperCase()));}public static <T> void demo3(List<T> list, Consumer<T> consumer) {    list.forEach(consumer);}

å¤šçº¿ç¨‹ä¸‹çš„ABAé—®é¢˜ä»¥åŠjucåŒ…çš„ä½¿ç”¨(lambdaè®¾è®¡)

public static void main(String[] args) {    demo(            () -> new int[10],            (array) -> array.length,            (array, index) -> array[index]++,            array -> System.out.println(Arrays.toString(array))    );    demo(            () -> new AtomicIntegerArray(10),            (array) -> array.length(),            (array, index) -> array.getAndIncrement(index),            array -> System.out.println(array)    );}private static <T> void demo(        Supplier<T> arraySupplier,        Function<T, Integer> lengthFun,        BiConsumer<T, Integer> putConsumer,        Consumer<T> printConsumer) {    List<Thread> ts = new ArrayList<>();    // æ•°ç»„    T array = arraySupplier.get();    // æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦ l    int length = lengthFun.apply(array);    // å®šä¹‰lä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {        ts.add(new Thread(() -> {            // æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹æ•°ç»„ä½œ 10000 æ¬¡æ“ä½œ            for (int j = 0; j < 10000; j++) {                /*                 * [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] å¯¹æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªæ•°è¿›è¡Œéå†, å¹¶åªå¯¹å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªè¿›è¡Œç´¯åŠ , æ‰§è¡Œ10000æ¬¡                 * è¯´æ˜: åœ¨ç†æƒ³æ¡ä»¶ä¸‹, æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¯ä»¥ç´¯åŠ é™æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ç´¯åŠ è‡³1000, 10ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¯å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ç´¯åŠ è‡³10000                 *      ä½†æ˜¯æ™®é€šçš„ ++ æ“ä½œéåŸå­æ€§, çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨, æ— æ³•ç´¯åŠ åˆ°1000                 *      å› æ­¤æ­¤å¤„éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ AtomicIntegerArray åŸå­ç±»                 */                putConsumer.accept(array, j % length);            }        }));    }    ts.forEach(Thread::start); // å¯åŠ¨æ‰€æœ‰çº¿ç¨‹    ts.forEach(t -> {        try {            t.join();        } catch (InterruptedException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    });     // ç­‰æ‰€æœ‰çº¿ç¨‹ç»“æŸ    printConsumer.accept(array);}

-- ====DM(è¾¾æ¢¦å»ºè®®é€šè¿‡DMç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ä»£ç†-è®¡åˆ’ä»»åŠ¡å®ç°)-- ====mysql-- â€»â€»â€» å­˜å‚¨è¿‡ç¨‹drop procedure if exists <pro_å­˜å‚¨åç§°>;delimiter $$CREATE PROCEDURE <pro_å­˜å‚¨åç§°>()BEGIN-- é€»è¾‘END $$delimiter ;-- æŸ¥çœ‹show procedure status;show create procedure <pro_å­˜å‚¨åç§°>;-- â€»â€»â€» äº‹ä»¶-- åˆ›å»ºäº‹ä»¶drop event if exists `<event_äº‹ä»¶åç§°>`;create EVENT    `<event_äº‹ä»¶åç§°>`  -- åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶    ON SCHEDULE EVERY        1 DAY -- æ¯é—´éš”ä¸€å¤©æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡        STARTS            '2023-04-25 00:00:00' -- ä»2023-04-25 00:00:00åå¼€å§‹    ON COMPLETION        PRESERVE ENABLE  -- æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆä¹‹åä¸åˆ é™¤å®šæ—¶å™¨    DO    call <pro_å­˜å‚¨åç§°>(); -- æ¯æ¬¡è§¦å‘å®šæ—¶å™¨æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œçš„è¯­å¥-- æŸ¥è¯¢äº‹ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½SELECT @@event_scheduler;-- å¼€å¯äº‹ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½SET GLOBAL event_scheduler = 1;-- å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½SET GLOBAL event_scheduler = 0;-- å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶ALTER EVENT event_sync_cxpt_reg_threetype ON COMPLETION PRESERVE DISABLE;-- å¼€å¯äº‹ä»¶ALTER EVENT event_sync_cxpt_reg_threetype ON COMPLETION PRESERVE ENABLE;-- æŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰äº‹ä»¶SHOW EVENTS;

// æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼åŒ–å·¥å…·ç±»export function formatDate(value, pattern) {  const dt = new Date(value)  if (pattern === 'yyyy-M-d') { // yyyy-M-d    const year = dt.getFullYear()    const month = dt.getMonth() + 1    const date = dt.getDate()    return `${year}-${month}-${date}`  } else if (pattern === 'yyyy-M-d H:m:s') { // yyyy-M-d H:m:s    const year = dt.getFullYear()    const month = dt.getMonth() + 1    const date = dt.getDate()    const hour = dt.getHours()    const minute = dt.getMinutes()    const second = dt.getSeconds()    return `${year}-${month}-${date} ${hour}:${minute}:${second}`  } else if (pattern === 'yyyy-MM-dd') { // yyyy-MM-dd    const year = dt.getFullYear()    const month = (dt.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')    const date = dt.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0')    return `${year}-${month}-${date}`  } else { // yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss    const year = dt.getFullYear()    const month = (dt.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')    const date = dt.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0')    const hour = dt.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0')    const minute = dt.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0')    const second = dt.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2, '0')    return `${year}-${month}-${date} ${hour}:${minute}:${second}`  }}

entry.title: å‰åç«¯apiäº¤äº’å®‰å…¨
entry.content:
demo1

sequenceDiagramactor c as å®¢æˆ·ç«¯participant f as å‰ç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨participant b as åç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨c ->> f: è§¦å‘è¯·æ±‚f ->> +b: å‘é€è¯·æ±‚b ->> b: é€šè¿‡RSAç”Ÿæˆpubkey1å’Œprikey1note right of b: pubkey1, prikey1b -->> -f: å°†pubkey1è¿”å›å‰ç«¯b --> +f: f ->> f: é€šè¿‡RSAç”Ÿæˆpubkey2å’Œprikey2note left of f: pubkey2, prikey2f ->> f: åŠ å¯†: pubkey1(pubkey2) => secret1f ->> -b: ç”¨secret1è¯·æ±‚åç«¯f --> +b: b ->> b: è§£å¯†: prikey1(secret1) => pubkey2b ->> b: åŠ å¯†: pubkey2(AESkey) => secret2b ->> -f: è¿”å›secret2b --> +f: f ->> f: è§£å¯†: prikey2(secret2) => AESkeyf ->> f: åŠ å¯†: AESkey(data) => secretDataf ->> -b: å°†åŠ å¯†æ•°æ®å‘é€ç»™åç«¯
<template>  <div>    <input type="text" v-model="text" />    <button @click="encryptData">åŠ å¯†</button>    <button @click="decryptData">è§£å¯†</button>  </div></template><script>import CryptoJS from 'crypto-js'export default {  data() {    return {      text: '',      key: null,      nonce: null,      ciphertext: null,      tag: null    }  },  methods: {    // ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•åŠ å¯†æ•°æ®    encryptData() {      const key = CryptoJS.lib.WordArray.random(16)      const nonce = CryptoJS.lib.WordArray.random(12)      const encrypted = CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(this.text, key, {        mode: CryptoJS.mode.GCM,        iv: nonce      })      this.key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify(key)      this.nonce = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify(nonce)      this.ciphertext = encrypted.ciphertext.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Base64)      this.tag = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.stringify(encrypted.finalize())    },    // ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•è§£å¯†æ•°æ®    decryptData() {      const key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(this.key)      const nonce = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(this.nonce)      const ciphertext = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(this.ciphertext)      const tag = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(this.tag)      const decrypted = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(        { ciphertext },        key,        {          mode: CryptoJS.mode.GCM,          iv: nonce,          tag: tag        }      )      this.text = decrypted.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)    }  }}</script>
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;import java.security.KeyPair;import java.security.KeyPairGenerator;import java.security.PrivateKey;import java.security.PublicKey;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.AESEngine;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.modes.GCMBlockCipher;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.AEADParameters;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.KeyParameter;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.util.PrivateKeyFactory;import org.bouncycastle.crypto.util.PublicKeyFactory;public class EncryptionUtil {    private static final int KEY_SIZE = 2048;    // ç”ŸæˆRSAå¯†é’¥å¯¹    public static KeyPair generateKeyPair() throws Exception {        KeyPairGenerator generator = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA", "BC");        generator.initialize(KEY_SIZE);        return generator.generateKeyPair();    }    // ä½¿ç”¨RSAå…¬é’¥åŠ å¯†AESå¯†é’¥    public static byte[] encryptKey(byte[] key, PublicKey publicKey) throws Exception {        byte[] encryptedKey = null;        try {            GCMBlockCipher cipher = new GCMBlockCipher(new AESEngine());            KeyParameter keyParameter = new KeyParameter(key);            AEADParameters parameters = new AEADParameters(keyParameter, 128, new byte[12]);            cipher.init(true, parameters);            encryptedKey = new byte[cipher.getOutputSize(key.length)];            int len = cipher.processBytes(key, 0, key.length, encryptedKey, 0);            cipher.doFinal(encryptedKey, len);        } catch (InvalidCipherTextException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        return PublicKeyFactory.createKey(publicKey.getEncoded()).encrypt(encryptedKey);    }    // ä½¿ç”¨RSAç§é’¥è§£å¯†AESå¯†é’¥    public static byte[] decryptKey(byte[] encryptedKey, PrivateKey privateKey) throws Exception {        byte[] decryptedKey = PrivateKeyFactory.createKey(privateKey.getEncoded()).decrypt(encryptedKey);        GCMBlockCipher cipher = new GCMBlockCipher(new AESEngine());        KeyParameter keyParameter = new KeyParameter(decryptedKey);        AEADParameters parameters = new AEADParameters(keyParameter, 128, new byte[12]);        cipher.init(false, parameters);        byte[] key = new byte[cipher.getOutputSize(decryptedKey.length)];        int len = cipher.processBytes(decryptedKey, 0, decryptedKey.length, key, 0);        cipher.doFinal(key, len);        return key;    }    // ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•åŠ å¯†æ•°æ®    public static byte[] encryptData(byte[] data, byte[] key) throws Exception {        GCMBlockCipher cipher = new GCMBlockCipher(new AESEngine());        KeyParameter keyParameter = new KeyParameter(key);        AEADParameters parameters = new AEADParameters(keyParameter, 128, new byte[12]);        cipher.init(true, parameters);        byte[] ciphertext = new byte[cipher.getOutputSize(data.length)];        int len = cipher.processBytes(data, 0, data.length, ciphertext, 0);        cipher.doFinal(ciphertext, len);        return ciphertext;    }    // ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•è§£å¯†æ•°æ®    public static byte[] decryptData(byte[] ciphertext, byte[] key, byte[] nonce, byte[] tag) throws Exception {        GCMBlockCipher cipher = new GCMBlockCipher(new AESEngine());        KeyParameter keyParameter = new KeyParameter(key);        AEADParameters parameters = new AEADParameters(keyParameter, 128, nonce, tag);        cipher.init(false, parameters);        byte[] data = new byte[cipher.getOutputSize(ciphertext.length)];        int len = cipher.processBytes(ciphertext, 0, ciphertext.length, data, 0);        cipher.doFinal(data, len);        return data;    }    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {        // ç”ŸæˆRSAå¯†é’¥å¯¹        KeyPair keyPair = generateKeyPair();        PublicKey publicKey = keyPair.getPublic();        PrivateKey privateKey = keyPair.getPrivate();        // åŠ å¯†æ•°æ®        String data = "Hello World!";        byte[] key = new byte[16];        for (int i = 0; i < key.length; i++) {            key[i] = (byte) (Math.random() * 256);        }        byte[] encryptedKey = encryptKey(key, publicKey);        byte[] nonce = new byte[12];        for (int i = 0; i < nonce.length; i++) {            nonce[i] = (byte) (Math.random() * 256);        }        byte[] ciphertext = encryptData(data.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), key);        byte[] tag = new byte[16];        System.arraycopy(ciphertext, ciphertext.length - 16, tag, 0, 16);        // è¾“å‡ºåŠ å¯†åçš„æ•°æ®        System.out.println("Key: " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(key));        System.out.println("Nonce: " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(nonce));        System.out.println("Ciphertext: " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(ciphertext));        System.out.println("Tag: " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(tag));        // è§£å¯†æ•°æ®        key = decryptKey(encryptedKey, privateKey);        byte[] plaintext = decryptData(ciphertext, key, nonce, tag);        System.out.println(new String(plaintext, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));  // è¾“å‡ºï¼šHello World!    }}

ä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç ä½¿ç”¨äº†CryptoJSåº“å’ŒBouncy Castleåº“å®ç°äº†å‰åç«¯æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œå‰ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨RSAå…¬é’¥åŠ å¯†AESå¯†é’¥ï¼Œå°†åŠ å¯†åçš„å¯†é’¥å’ŒåŠ å¯†åçš„æ•°æ®ä¸€èµ·å‘é€ç»™åç«¯ã€‚åç«¯ä½¿ç”¨RSAç§é’¥è§£å¯†AESå¯†é’¥ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨è§£å¯†åçš„å¯†é’¥å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œè§£å¯†ã€‚åŒæ ·ï¼Œåç«¯ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨AESç®—æ³•å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨RSAå…¬é’¥åŠ å¯†AESå¯†é’¥ï¼Œå°†åŠ å¯†åçš„å¯†é’¥å’ŒåŠ å¯†åçš„æ•°æ®ä¸€èµ·å‘é€ç»™å‰ç«¯ã€‚å‰ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨RSAç§é’¥è§£å¯†AESå¯†é’¥ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨è§£å¯†åçš„å¯†é’¥å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œè§£å¯†ã€‚

ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

  1. å‰ç«¯æ‰“å¼€æ–°çª—å£, å¹¶è¯·æ±‚ gitee
giteeHandleClick(thirdpart) {    const client_id = 'client_idxxxxx' // giteeid    const redirect_uri = encodeURIComponent('http://uri/tp/gitee_cb') // giteeè·³è½¬åœ°å€    const url = `https://gitee.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=${client_id}&redirect_uri=${redirect_uri}&response_type=code`    window.open(url, thirdpart, 540, 540) // url,ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯}
  1. åç«¯æ¥æ”¶gitee æ‰€ä¼ code -> è·å–access_token -> è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ -> ç”Ÿæˆç”¨æˆ·token å¹¶è¿”å›ç»™å‰ç«¯
public void gitee(String code, HttpServletResponse resp) throws IOException {    //è·å–è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ    String accessToken = this.getAccessToken(code);    //è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯    Map<String, Object> body = this.getUserInfo(accessToken);    Object username = body.get("name");    Object avatar = body.get("avatar_url");    //ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å­˜å‚¨æœ¬åœ°, ç”ŸæˆJWTä»¤ç‰Œç»™å‰ç«¯    String token = userService.loginFromOAuth(username.toString(), avatar.toString(), "");    //è®©é¡µé¢å»å‘é€ä¿¡æ¯ç»™å‰ç«¯è°ƒç”¨è€…    String script = String.format("<script>
" +                                  "window.opener.postMessage('%s','%s')
" +                                  "window.close()
" +                                  "</script>",                                  //ç»™è°ƒç”¨è€…å‘é€ä¿¡æ¯,(è¯¦ç»†å†…å®¹,æ¥æº)æŒ‡æ˜æ¶ˆæ¯æ¥æº, å¦åˆ™ä¼šè·¨åŸŸ                                  //window.opener.postMessage(message,origin)                                  //window.close() å…³é—­å°çª—å£                                  token,                                  frontendURL);    resp.getWriter().print(script);}private String getAccessToken(String code) throws IOException {    String json = new ObjectMapper().writeValueAsString(MapBuilder.create()                                    .put("grant_type", "authorization_code")                                    .put("client_id", clientId)                                    .put("client_secret", clientSecret)                                    .put("code", code)                                    .put("redirect_uri", redirectURI).build()                                                       );    HttpHeaders headers = new HttpHeaders();    headers.setContentType(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON);    HttpEntity<String> httpEntity = new HttpEntity<>(json, headers);    ResponseEntity<String> response = restTemplate.postForEntity("https://gitee.com/oauth/token", httpEntity, String.class);    Map body = new ObjectMapper().readValue(response.getBody(), Map.class);    return body.getOrDefault("access_token", "").toString();}private Map<String, Object> getUserInfo(String accessToken) throws IOException {    ResponseEntity<String> response = restTemplate.getForEntity(URI.create("https://gitee.com/api/v5/user?access_token=" + accessToken), String.class);    Map body = new ObjectMapper().readValue(response.getBody(), Map.class);    return body;}
  1. å‰ç«¯ç›‘å¬åˆ°tokenä¿¡æ¯, å†™å…¥ç”¨æˆ·Cookie

entry.title: vue_axios
entry.content:
Axiosè¯·æ±‚ç¤ºä¾‹

æœ¬ç¯‡åŸºäºvue2, ç®€å•è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨, å¹¶å‘é€postè¯·æ±‚è‡³åç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨

1. å®‰è£…

npm install axios -S

2. æ‹¦æˆªå™¨é…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹

import axios from "axios"// åˆ›å»ºaxiosconst _axios = axios.create({    baseURL: "http://localhost:23323"})_axios.interceptors.request.use(    config => {        // è®¾ç½®tokenè¯·æ±‚å¤´        config.headers = {            Authorization: '222.333.zzZ'        }        return config    },error => {        return Promise.reject(error)    })_axios.interceptors.response.use(    rep => {        // 2xxèŒƒå›´èµ°è¿™é‡Œ        return rep    }, error => {        if (error.response === undefined){            return Promise.reject(error);        }        // è¶…å‡º2xxèµ°è¿™é‡Œ, ç¤ºä¾‹åˆ—ä¸¾        let status = error.response.status        if (status === 400){            window.alert('è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯')            return Promise.resolve(400)        } else if (status === 404){            window.alert('èµ„æºä¸å­˜åœ¨');            return Promise.resolve(404)        } else if (status === 405) {            window.alert('è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼é”™è¯¯')            return Promise.resolve(405)        }        return Promise.reject(error)    })export default _axios

3. axiosä½¿ç”¨(POSTç¤ºä¾‹)

3.1 URLæ‹¼æ¥å‚æ•°

async sendPostWithUrl() {  // æ­¤å¤„æ³¨æ„,éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç   let name = encodeURIComponent('dee+')  let age = 18  const resp = await axios.post(`/uri?name=${name}&age=${age}`)  console.log(resp)}

Request URL: http://ip:port/uri?name=dee%2B&age=18 (ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¿›è¡Œunicodeç¼–ç )

Response Headers: ä¸­æ—  Content-Type

3.2 å°†å‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡æ”¾å…¥config

async sendPostWithConfig() {  const resp = await _axios.post(`/uri`, null, {    params: {      name: 'dee+',      age: 20    }  })  console.log(resp)}

Request URL: http://ip:port/uri?name=dee%2B&age=20 (ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¿›è¡Œunicodeç¼–ç )

Response Headers :

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

3.3 å…ˆurlencodeç¼–ç , å†é€šè¿‡dataå‚æ•°å‘é€è¯·æ±‚

async sendPostWithUrlEncoded() {  let stu = new URLSearchParams()  stu.append('name', 'dee+')  stu.append('age', 38)  const resp = await _axios.post(`/uri`, stu)  console.log(resp)}

Request URL: http://ip:port/uri

Response Headers :

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8

3.4 form-dataæ ¼å¼è¯·æ±‚

async sendPostWithFormdata() {  let stu = new FormData()  stu.append("name", 'dee+')  stu.append("age", 38)  const resp = await _axios.post(`/uri`, stu)  console.log(resp)}

Request URL: http://ip:port/uri

Response Headers :

Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundaryvOzpiDlfBzqdp23l

3.5 jsonæ ¼å¼è¯·æ±‚

async sendWithJson() {  let stu = {    name: 'dee+',    age: 30  }  const resp = await axios.post(`/uri`, stu)  console.log(resp);}

Request URL: http://ip:port/uri

Response Headers :

Content-Type: application/json
